title: Mashup Account’s Related Opportunities from a Remote Org
overview: A #Data List is configured on the Account Lightning Record Page to display related Opportunities from a remote Salesforce org, using a dynamic filter that matches the remote org’s Account External ID to the current Account’s ID.
generalUseCase: Use #Data List with dynamic filters to surface related data from an authorized connected org and let users take action or synchronize records when needed. This mashup pattern avoids migrating data across orgs and keeps users working entirely within their current Salesforce org.
